subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A judge in Greensboro, N.C., has sentenced the son of the North Carolina State basketball coach, Sidney Lowe, to 15 months in a prison farm on charges that include robbery and kidnapping. Superior Court Judge Henry Frye Jr. also ordered that Lowe serve five years of probation.
